评论详情: The quality is decent but the design is horrible. the moon slips through the sun and falls off often.

I really liked this necklace, it's beautiful and dainty. The only thing wrong is that you will lose it, they need to adjust the moon measurement because all it does is keep slipping out the sun hole. It's very frustrating because it's cute and you want to wear it but there's the fear of it coming undone and losing it if you do.

Cute necklace but the moon constantly slips out the sun and makes it come off even with it clasped in the back it’ll come undone in the front .. it’s cute I wanted to like it but can’t wear it for more than 10 mins without it coming off …
I loved this necklace, it looked so pretty, but the moon kept sliding through the sun and falling off, and then it broke :(
